kickstart.description: HDF (Hierarchical Object Oriented Format) libraries module files http://www.hdfgroup.org/products/hdf4 http://www.hdfgroup.org/products/hdf5

kickstart.post:
for COMPILER in `ls /opt/hdf4`; do
/bin/mkdir -m 0755 -p /opt/modulefiles/applications/.$COMPILER/hdf4
cat > /opt/modulefiles/applications/.$COMPILER/hdf4/2r4 << END #%Module1.0 module-whatis "hdf4" module-whatis "Version: 2r4" module-whatis "Description: hdf4" module-whatis "Compiler: $COMPILER" set hdf4Home /opt/hdf4/$COMPILER setenv HDF4HOME \$hdf4Home prepend-path PATH \$hdf4Home/bin prepend-path LD_LIBRARY_PATH \$hdf4Home/lib prepend-path LIBPATH \$hdf4Home/lib END chmod 0644 /opt/modulefiles/applications/.$COMPILER/hdf4/2r4
cat > /opt/modulefiles/applications/.$COMPILER/hdf4/.version.2r4 << END #%Module1.0 set ModulesVersion "2r4" END chmod 0644 /opt/modulefiles/applications/.$COMPILER/hdf4/.version.2r4
/bin/ln -s /opt/modulefiles/applications/.$COMPILER/hdf4/.version.2r4 \ /opt/modulefiles/applications/.$COMPILER/hdf4/.version
done
for COMPILER in `ls /opt/hdf5`; do
/bin/mkdir -m 0755 -p /opt/modulefiles/applications/.$COMPILER/hdf5
cat > /opt/modulefiles/applications/.$COMPILER/hdf5/1.8.3 << END #%Module1.0 module-whatis "hdf5" module-whatis "Version: 1.8.3" module-whatis "Description: hdf5" module-whatis "Compiler:$COMPILER" set hdf5Home /opt/hdf5/$COMPILER setenv HDF5HOME \$hdf5Home prepend-path PATH \$hdf5Home/bin prepend-path LD_LIBRARY_PATH \$hdf5Home/lib prepend-path LIBPATH \$hdf5Home/lib END chmod 0644 /opt/modulefiles/applications/.$COMPILER/hdf5/1.8.3
cat > /opt/modulefiles/applications/.$COMPILER/hdf5/.version.1.8.3 << END #%Module1.0 set ModulesVersion "1.8.3" END chmod 0644 /opt/modulefiles/applications/.$COMPILER/hdf5/.version.1.8.3
/bin/ln -s /opt/modulefiles/applications/.$COMPILER/hdf5/.version.1.8.3 \ /opt/modulefiles/applications/.$COMPILER/hdf5/.version
done
